channel.title: Files on DefectDojo Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Files on DefectDojo Documentation

item.title: Acunetix Scanner
item.description:
This parser imports the Acunetix Scanner with xml output or Acunetix 360 Scanner with JSON output.

Sample Scan Data

Sample Acunetix Scanner scans can be found here.

item.title: Anchore Enterprise Policy Check
item.description:
Anchore-CLI JSON policy check report format.

Sample Scan Data

Sample Anchore Enterprise Policy Check scans can be found here.

Default Deduplication Hashcode Fields

By default, DefectDojo identifies duplicate Findings using these hashcode fields:

item.title: Anchore Enterprise Vulnerability
item.description:
File Types

DefectDojo parser accepts a .json file.

You can generate vulnerability data using the Anchore Enterprise CLI tool, Anchorectl, or through the Enterprise UI.

item.title: Anchore Grype
item.description:
File Types

DefectDojo parser accepts a .json file.

Anchore Grype JSON files are created using the Grype CLI, using the ‘–output=json’ option. See: https://github.com/anchore/grype

item.title: AnchoreCTL Policies Report
item.description:
AnchoreCTLs JSON policies report format. Both legacy list-based format and new evaluation-based format are supported.

Usage

To generate a policy report that can be imported into DefectDojo:

item.description:

Sample Scan Data

item.title: AppCheck Web Application Scanner
item.description:
Accepts AppCheck Web Application Scanner output in .json format.

Sample Scan Data

Sample AppCheck Web Application Scanner scans can be found here.

item.title: AppSpider (Rapid7)
item.description:
Use the VulnerabilitiesSummary.xml file found in the zipped report download.

Sample Scan Data

Sample AppSpider (Rapid7) scans can be found here.

item.title: Aqua
item.description:
File Types

DefectDojo parser accepts JSON report format.

See Aqua documention: https://docs.aquasec.com

CI/CD Scans

Aqua scanning can be integrated with several types of third-party CI/CD systems.

item.title: Arachni Scanner
item.description:
Arachni Web Scanner (https://www.arachni-scanner.com)

Reports are generated with arachni_reporter tool this way:

arachni_reporter --reporter 'json' js.com.afr

Sample Scan Data

Sample Arachni Scanner scans can be found here.
